references: L. Carlitz, R. Scoville and V. E. Hoggatt, Jr., Pellian representatives, Fib. Quart., 10 (1972), 449-488.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: ni[n_]:=Module[{c=1+Sqrt[2],a,b,x},x=c n;a=Floor[x];b=Ceiling[x]; If[x-a<b-x,a,b]]; Array[ni,60] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 04 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
